params.destKey: currency key of the destination synth
params.sourceKey: currency key of the source synth
params.synthAmount: amount of the synth to swap

returns._0: amount of the destination synth received

params.deadline: latest timestamp to accept this transaction
params.minAmount: the min amount the user would like to receive, or revert.
params.swap: the address of a pool to swap through
params.tokenFrom: the address of the stored synth
params.tokenFromAmount: the amount of the token to swap
params.tokenFromIndex: the index of the token to swap from
params.tokenToIndex: the token the user wants to swap to

params.recipient: the address of the account to receive the token
params.shouldDestroy: whether this contract should be destroyed after this call
params.token: the address of the token to withdraw
params.withdrawAmount: the amount of the token to withdraw

methods.constructor: Initializes the contract when deploying this directly. This prevents others from calling initialize() on the target contract and setting themself as the owner.

destroy().notice: Destroys this contract. Only owner can call this function.

initialize().notice: Sets the `owner` as the caller of this function

swapSynth(bytes32,uint256,bytes32).notice: Swaps the synth to another synth via the Synthetix protocol.

swapSynthToToken(address,address,uint8,u.notice: Approves the given `tokenFrom` and swaps it to another token via the given `swap` pool.

withdraw(address,address,uint256,bool).notice: Withdraws the given amount of `token` to the `recipient`.

userdoc.notice: Replacement of Virtual Synths in favor of gas savings. Allows swapping synths via the Synthetix protocol or Saddle's pools. The `Bridge.sol` contract will deploy minimal clones of this contract upon initiating any cross-asset swaps.
